TextBody:
Hello Pravin,

Thank you for contacting us.

We do not provide direct support for generating the certificates but we can show you where you need to import it.

Please navigate on the Epp server to "Appliance > Server Maintenance > Server Certificate as shown below:



And in the left text box pase the body of the certficate while on the right side paste in the key. Then save the changes and check.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0N30Cj:ref
Subject: How to upload SSL Certificate.    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0N30Cj:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000N30Cj:ref

While applying the certificate, the following message appears. After clicking "OK," the same screen reappears.

https://drive.bdsoftware.in/external/0d803c064c0babb4f83efd83da5fe5c4e9260c87ca76d1580c868e5aa71f8b88
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #439094 - How to upload SSL Certificate.

TextBody:
Hello Pravin,

Thank you for following up on this.

The message is expected. Try to click on ''OK'', that's when the certificate will actually start to import.

After a minute or two, refresh the page and check if the certificate is imported accordingly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000N30Cj:ref

Hello Marian,

 

Thank you! The certificate has been uploaded and is functioning as expected.

 

However, we are facing a new issue where some Linux machines are online but
appear offline in the EPP console. Could you please share a troubleshooting
guide along with the name of the EPP service that we can restart to verify
the status?

 

Of course, I will raise a new ticket for this but your quick help will be
appreciated.

 


Thanks & Regards,

Pravin B.

Lead - Technical Support

TextBody:
Hello Pravin,

Thank you for the confirmation.

I am glad to hear that the issue with the SSL certificate has been sorted out.

In regards of the Linux machines, I would recommend to raise this as a separate ticket and we will take it from there with you because we need to separate the issues so we can have only one problem per ticket.

Also, for this problem, we would need more details before coming up with a response, therefore please raise a ticket with us.

Let me know if you have other inquiries related to the SSL certificate or if it's ok to close the case.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
